column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I flew from Amsterdam to New York City last week .
#id=2
#text=I had purchased and reserved my ticket a week in advance .
#id=3
#text=I left the hostel I was staying and arrived at Schiphol Airport at about 21:00 .
#id=4
#text=After waiting about 2 hours for the flight check-in , I boarded the plane .
#id=5
#text=I went to and found my seat , located on the left-hand side near the middle of the plane .
#id=6
#text=I placed some of my hand luggage in an overhead compartment and sat down next to another passenger who was seated to my right .
#id=7
#text=I watched the rest of remaining passengers who were heading to their seats .
#id=8
#text=About 20 minutes later , once everyone was seated and were given basic safety instructions by the flight attendants , the pilot announced that the we were now going to take off for New York .
#id=9
#text=The plane engines then started , and we were soon airborne with Amsterdam soon far below us .
#text=It was a evening flight , so I slept on and off for a little while , then began watching an in-flight movie .
#text=After about 3 hours , we were served a light dinner of a chicken entree , bread , and juice .
#text=The food was surprisingly tasty and I enjoyed it .
#text=After finishing my meal , I relaxed and occasionally looked out the window at the night sky , as well as occasionally chatting with the person sitting next to me .
#text=Finally , the pilot announced that we were approaching JFK airport .
#text=The plane touched down shortly afterwards , and we safely landed in New York .
